title: Save the Ship
atmosphere: Chaos. Volcanic debris raining down. Ship systems failing. Alarms blaring. Life or death decisions in seconds. The culmination of everything that came before.
description: The volcanic eruption threatens to destroy Highndry with the Travellers aboard. Impact damage, system failures, and desperate piloting determine if they survive.
objectives: Land safely (or crash as gently as possible)

triggers.exit: Ship lands/crashes, Travellers survive or don't

sequence.description: 3D damage to random system. Ship goes out of control.
sequence.effects: Immediate system damage, loss of stable flight

sequence.description: Ship tumbles upward, gaining altitude uncontrollably.
sequence.check: Athletics 8+ to avoid injury from tumbling

sequence.description: Ship enters flat spin, losing altitude rapidly.
Auto-stabilization kicks in, giving pilot a chance.

skill_checks.trigger: Attempting to bypass damaged power systems
Piloting to regain control (up to 3 attempts)

outcomes.three_successes: Smooth landing, minimal damage. Ship fully operational.
outcomes.two_successes: Rough landing. Additional system damage. Ship flyable.
outcomes.one_success: Hard crash. Significant damage. Ship needs major repairs.
outcomes.zero_successes: Catastrophic crash. Survivors (if any) injured. Ship may be destroyed.

damage_mechanics.crash_landing: Additional damage based on pilot successes

narrator_prompt: Everything happens at once. The mountain explodes. Debris tears through the air. Something hits Highndry hard. Alarms scream. The ship tumbles. In these seconds, everything the Travellers have learned and prepared for will be tested. This is the moment that defines them.
